name: Color Change
summary: When hit by a damage-dealing move, the Pok√©mon will change its type to the type of the move used. Status ailments will change the type after it is inflicted.
viability: Kecleon by default ran this when it was its only ability. Now that Protean exists, there's no reason to be running Color Change. Even if Kecleon changes to a different type, you can always counter that with another type. With Protean, you have much more control of what you want Kecleon's type to be, and can act accordingly.
